channel.title: LocalHost Connection Issue
channel.description: There is a problem connecting to my server from my client locally. Every time I start the server and try to connect it says "Null Disconnected <localhost>". This wasn't happening yesterday and I haven't made any changes.. wtf??? It's delta-based btw, but that doesn't matter cause I sent it to my friend and it works for him.

item.title: LocalHost Connection Issue
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

There is a problem connecting to my server from my client locally.
Every time I start the server and try to connect it says "Null Disconnected ".
This wasn’t happening yesterday and I haven’t made any changes… wtf???
It’s delta-based btw, but that doesn’t matter cause I sent it to my friend and it works for him.

Read full topic
